# Modal Footer

## Usage:

```html
<p-modal-footer>
    <!-- content -->
</p-modal-footer>
```

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property       | Attribute        | Description                         | Type      | Default |
| -------------- | ---------------- | ----------------------------------- | --------- | ------- |
| `hideOnMobile` | `hide-on-mobile` | Wether to show the footer on mobile | `boolean` | `true`  |


## Dependencies

### Used by

 - [p-modal](../../organisms/modal)

### Depends on

- [p-divider](../divider)

### Graph
```mermaid
graph TD;
  p-modal-footer --> p-divider
  p-modal --> p-modal-footer

```
